name: Totally Accurate Battlegrounds

reviews: It's tough man, this really did turn out to be such a fun game and probably the best battle royale type game I've played. But the devs kind of dropped the ball when they released the cosmetic shop then just gave up. The game deserves more love and attention. Really fun playing the game from the beginning and seeing the evolution of the game to where it ended up in terms of gameplay
It's free, it's fun, it's addictive. It's worth supporting the team behind it, as they make funny games. I'd like to see more of their funny 'silly' games.

REVIVE THIS GAME IF ANY

VERY FUN UNIQUE GAME PLAY
This is like PUBG if you were on LSD

short_description: Grab your balloon crossbow and trusty inflatable hammer, because things are about to get wobbly! Be the last weirdo standing in the world-leading physics-based Battle Royale game.
